articles.title: Emergency protective order filed against Rajon Rondo dismissed
articles.description: An emergency protective order filed last month against Rajon Rondo has been dismissed.
articles.content:
An emergency protective order filed last month against veteran point guard Rajon Rondo in Louisville, Kentucky, has been dismissed.

articles.title: Katie Ledecky wins fourth 1,500-meter freestyle title, record-extending 17th overall
articles.description: Katie Ledecky led an American one-two and won her fourth 1,500-meter freestyle title at the world swimming championships and record-extending 17th overall.
articles.content:
BUDAPEST, Hungary -- Katie Ledecky led an American one-two and won her fourth 1,500-meter freestyle title at the world swimming championships on Monday.

articles.title: Houston Baptist men's basketball star Darius Lee killed, 8 others shot at Harlem gathering
articles.description: Darius Lee, a 21-year-old senior who starred for Houston Baptist, was killed at a gathering in Harlem. An All-Southland Conference pick, Lee led the Huskies in scoring and rebounding and was sixth in the nation in steals per game.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- A college basketball player was killed and eight other people were wounded Monday in an early-morning shooting at a gathering in Harlem, New York City police said.

articles.title: Orlando Magic still evaluating all options with No. 1 pick in NBA draft
articles.description: The Magic haven't decided yet what they'll do on Thursday night when the NBA draft rolls around and they have the No. 1 pick.
articles.content:
ORLANDO, Fla. -- College basketball season ended almost three months ago, the NBA draft lottery was more than a month ago and the draft itself is later this week.

articles.title: Source - Dallas Stars closing in on deal to hire Peter DeBoer as coach
articles.description: The Stars are set to make Peter DeBoer their next coach to replace Rick Bowness, a source confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
The Dallas Stars are closing in on a contract with Peter DeBoer to make him their next coach, a source told ESPN on Monday, confirming multiple reports.
The news was first reported by TSN.

articles.title: Washington Commanders owner Daniel Snyder, again, rebuffs House Oversight Committee's invitation to testify in workplace culture investigation of franchise
articles.description: Citing a long-planned business trip out of the country, Washington Commanders owner Dan Snyder, again, declined an invitation to testify before a Congressional oversight committee looking into his team's workplace culture.
articles.content:
